website_summaries.verdict: The perfect way to keep kids entertained at your wedding.
pros: Set includes 12 coloring books, 12 boxes of crayons, 12 gift bags, and 25 scavenger hunt sheets
Excellent party favor to keep kids entertained throughout the event
Quality gift bags are large enough to hold additional items
cons: You will need a camera to complete the scavenger hunt

customer_reviews.title: Speedy but occupying
customer_reviews.text: The price is too high for amount of items included. The bag is still pretty empty once everything is put inside, meaning you have to spend more money to buy more fillers. This product was good, the kids enjoyed it, but it was expensive for the items that came with it
customer_reviews.author: Mikayla M

customer_reviews.title: Wish the # of scavenger hunts matched the # of other supplies!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for our wedding, and I am not sure if anyone used the scavenger hunt, but they were cute and fun for the kids!
customer_reviews.author: JKPurdy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the little ones
customer_reviews.text: The kids are going to love these, the only thing I would change would be to add better crayons. These are those cheap crayons that break in seconds. Also probably not suitable for kids over like 6. Our 9 and 11 year old nieces and nephew would probably thing these aren't "rad" haha
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Thrasher

customer_reviews.title: Kids goody bag
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the kids attending my daughters wedding adding ring pops, fruits snacks and gold fish to keep the kiddos busy so parents can have fun
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA BENKO

customer_reviews.title: Wedding kid favor
customer_reviews.text: These were super cute and came in handy for all of the kids at our wedding. One thing I'd say is that there isn't much inside... But you can always add more things from the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: TN

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: These weren't exceptional, but they functioned well enough for our wedding. The bags are decent (and were the primary reason for my purchase) but the "coloring books" were really tiny and flimsy. (The kids didn't seem to care though.)
customer_reviews.author: Barista 101

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the wedding! Beautiful enough to sit on tables and not take away from the decor. The kids (and adults) loved it. Easy to set up. Goes with any theme.
customer_reviews.author: mobilenurse

customer_reviews.title: Fun kids’ books
customer_reviews.text: We bought these for our wedding and the kids loved them. Beware - the kids will be coming up to the bride and groom asking questions in an attempt to win the scavenger hunt! The gift bags make for a nice display as well.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: Not great quality but it got the job done. Mostly the adults liked it at the wedding 😂
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: kids wedding fun
customer_reviews.text: good items to entertain kids during wedding or rehearsal dinner
customer_reviews.author: Lee G. Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The kids at my son's wedding loved these! We added in some snacks. The parents appreciated them
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done, but flimsy paper
customer_reviews.text: This gets the job done, but the price is quite apparent in the quality. The paper is very thin and sheer. Crayons are ok. The paper bags are also thin, flimsy paper (not like the paper lunch bags sold at a grocery). The kids don't seem to mind, though. Its a great way to keep kids entertained at the wedding.
customer_reviews.author: FL-Gator-Fan

customer_reviews.title: very cute
customer_reviews.text: I got for kids during wedding. The kids lived then
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my wedding for the little kinds and it was so cute. Definitely love it
customer_reviews.author: Linda Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: A simple, affordable way to entertain guest kids on the big day!
customer_reviews.text: Let's face it, kids aren't all that excited about weddings. This was a great way to involve them in having fun. We just added some chocolates and they were good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lawless

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect touch for our wedding. Made the kids feel important. Room in the bag to add a snack too.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha b

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the kids busy
customer_reviews.text: These were a hit with the kids and the parents. Kept the kids busy during the “boring” speeches. Parents really appreciated them.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Henkelman

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: You need to add a couple more things to the bag like candy and bubbles and some mazes.
customer_reviews.author: Bel B

customer_reviews.title: Great decoration for kid table
customer_reviews.text: This was a hit at my wedding for the kid table. I loved the little bags, crayons, and coloring book.
customer_reviews.author: Candace Hall

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this for our wedding, kept them entertained and happy and was really neatly made.
customer_reviews.author: Manny Deras

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Item
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for the kids at my wedding and they loved it.
customer_reviews.author: D. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for the kids at the wedding. It will be fum!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Ferguson Rice

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for kids
customer_reviews.text: We used these at our wedding and they were great, great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Cennet

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great for a wedding day favor for kids activity table. They all liked the scavenger hunt papers.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa L.

customer_reviews.title: Order early enough to exchange if needed.
customer_reviews.text: I actually love these sets the only reason I couldn’t give them a full five stars is that almost half of one order came in printed wrong. The image was on the inside of the bag. 🙁
customer_reviews.author: Danielle C.

customer_reviews.title: Great for entertaining kiddos at a wedding
customer_reviews.text: These were great for my wedding! It kept the kids occupied and made them feel special. I added some candy and bubbles.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cute
customer_reviews.text: They were cute and simple and kept the younger kids at my wedding happy
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun wedding activity if your going to have kids their, we also provided instant cameras
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So perfect and amazing for the price!! I imagine the kids will love this at my wedding
customer_reviews.author: Elan Chantel

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!
customer_reviews.text: So cute for all the little people at a wedding. i added some other things to the bad too
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Budde

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Kids had a blast coloring and doing the scavenger hunt. On the negative side -the coloring book was not well printed, some pages had double or backwards pictures.
customer_reviews.author: MoBG

customer_reviews.title: Great fun for a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Everything we needed for the little ones at our wedding.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Big hit for the kids!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect favors for the kids at the wedding. Stuck some suckers and cookies in them to.
customer_reviews.author: christy

product_meta.title: Wedding Activities for Kids - Individually Packaged Wedding Coloring Books and Crayons (12), Wedding Favor Bags (12) and Wedding Scavenger Hunt Sheets (25)
product_meta.description: Color:BlueWedding Activities for Kids - Individually Packaged Wedding Coloring Books and Crayons (12), Wedding Favor Bags (12) and Wedding Scavenger Hunt Sheets (25)
feature_bullets: Keep Kids entertained at your Wedding!
12 Individually packaged wedding coloring books and crayons
Kids will stay busy and have fun!
25 Scavenger hunt sheets (great to combine with disposable cameras or use with cell phone cameras!)
Adorable wedding favors bags (12) with Bride and Groom art
